statements: DELETE FROM fair_trade_supply_chain WHERE country_of_origin = 'Mexico' AND fair_trade_certification = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fair_trade_products WHERE price > 50 AND rating < 4;
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE fair_trade_certified = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE fair_trade_certified = FALSE;
DELETE FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM fair_trade_practices WHERE certification_status = FALSE AND certification_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company' AND contact_person_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM products WHERE id = 4 AND price >= 100.00;
